meanings.sent1: She looked at him sourly when he ate the last cookie.

meanings.definition: Showing a bad temper or resentment
meanings.sent1: His sourly expression warned others to stay away.
meanings.sent2: The sourly child crossed his arms and refused to speak.
meanings.sent3: The sourly boss slammed the door on his way out of the office.
meanings.sent4: The sourly atmosphere in the room made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent5: Her sourly tone made it clear she was not in the mood to chat.
